prod_short_desc: Jump to the rescue and control the blaze with the Avengers and Spider-Man!
prod_long_desc:
Launch Captain America and Hawkeye against Spider-Man and Vision at the airport. Create an explosion effect by twisting the truck’s wheel cog to pop up the flames. Use the Super Jumper to launch Spider-Man at the burning truck and put out the fire, push the wind sock to trigger the exploding barrel function, and jump Hawkeye over the flame elements on his motorbike. Combine this set with 76051 Super Hero Airport Battle for an even bigger clash. Includes 4 minifigures.
Includes 4 minifigures: Captain America, Spider-Man, Hawkeye and Vision.
Features a tanker truck with detachable container and exploding function, wind sock with exploding barrels function and Hawkeye's motorbike.
Twist the tanker truck's wheel cog to open the fuel container and create an explosion effect with flames bursting out.
Activate the Super Jumper to launch Spider-Man at the exploding fuel container, or hit the wind sock to trigger the exploding barrel effect.
Also includes Hawkeye's bow and arrow element.
Accessory elements include Captain America's shield, Spider-Man's web blast, Vision's cape, 2 flames, fire extinguisher and a Super Jumper.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 6-12.
Combine with 76051 Super Hero Airport Battle to stage an even bigger encounter.
Tanker truck measures over 2” high, 9” long and 2” wide.
Motorbike measures over 2” long, 1” high and under 1” wide.
Wind sock measures over 5” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
